title: CONTAINERYARD / PANEL
description: very likely we need this panel to make mega-rich-light-bendy-guy container move.

dialogueTree.title: Crane Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with severa..."
dialogueTree.text: A rusting control panel with several knobs. The words *Marche* and *Arrêt* are -- very, very slightly -- even more faded with use.

links.title: You: "Press *Marche*."
links.text: Press *Marche*.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "No screech of metal when you push t..."
links.text: No screech of metal when you push the button this time. Only silence, as the crane remains in its state of dormancy.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "With a loud grind the crane shifts..."
links.text: With a loud grind the crane shifts overhead, moving a massive metal container through the air...

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "... and with a surprisingly quiet t..."
links.text: ... and with a surprisingly quiet thunk, the crane places the container down.

links.title: Inland Empire: "This crane was built with a purpose..."
links.text: This crane was built with a purpose which has now been fulfilled -- to move *this* container.

links.title: You: "What's inside the container?"
links.text: What's inside the container?

links.title: Inland Empire: "Who can say? All you know is -- it'..."
links.text: Who can say? All you know is -- it's special.

links.title: Kim Kitsuragi: ""I can't see how that was worth the..."
links.text: "I can't see how that was worth the ruckus..." He looks at the crate. "Except for seeing the crane in action. Which, I admit, was satisfying."

links.title: You: "Understood. Let's get back to the p..."
links.text: Understood. Let's get back to the panel.

links.title: Inland Empire: "If only you knew..."
links.text: If only you knew...

links.title: Interfacing: "The harbour sleeps as the strike ra..."
links.text: The harbour sleeps as the strike rages in the distance. The crane can rest again, now that its purpose has been fulfilled.

links.title: You: "Its purpose? What do you mean?"
links.text: Its purpose? What do you mean?

links.title: Interfacing: "Moving *this* container, of course...."
links.text: Moving *this* container, of course. For this purpose it was built; for this purpose it has acted. And now it will rest.

links.title: You: "Understood. Let's get back to the p..."
links.text: Understood. Let's get back to the panel.

links.title: Interfacing: "The rusty control panel grows warm..."
links.text: The rusty control panel grows warm to the touch. Then grows cold. It is finished.

links.title: Perception (Smell): "A faint smell of burning rubber rea..."
links.text: A faint smell of burning rubber reaches your nostrils. A short-circuit.

links.title: You: "Press *Arrêt*."
links.text: Press *Arrêt*.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "The crane does not return to its or..."
links.text: The crane does not return to its original position. It does not move at all.

links.title: Crane Control Panel: "The crane stands tall: proud, erect..."
links.text: The crane stands tall: proud, erect and *still*.

links.title: You: "[Leave.]"
links.text: [Leave.]

dialogueTree.title: Crane Control Panel: "A rusting control panel with severa..."
dialogueTree.text: A rusting control panel with several knobs. Two buttons, marked *Marche* and *Arrêt*, are faded with use. It seems to control the large crane above -- a container is attached to its hook block.

links.title: Encyclopedia: "*Marche* -- On. *Arrêt* -- Off."
links.text: *Marche* -- On. *Arrêt* -- Off.
